# Logisim PLA program table

#input
#Status[3] Instru[8] State[5]

#Output
#SelReg[4] SelAddr[3] FUNC[3] WRA WRB WRC WRD WRM1 WRM2 WRX WRY WRINC WRINST WRPC WRRAM WRJ1 WRJ2 BusSel WRSTATUS

#RESET
xxxxxxxxxxx00000 00000000000000000000000000

#FETCH
xxxxxxxxxxx00001 10110110000000000000000000
xxxxxxxxxxx00010 10110110000000000011000000
xxxxxxxxxxx00011 00001000000000000000100000

#jmp
xxxxxxxxxxx11001 10110110000000000010000100
xxxxxxxxxxx11010 10111000000000000010001000

#xxxxxxxxxxx11011 00000000000000000000100000
x0x1111000011011 00001000000000000000100000 # B if Negative /not branch
x1x1111000011011 00000100000000000000100000 # B if Negative branch

0xx1110100011011 00001000000000000000100000 # B if Carry /not branch
1xx1110100011011 00000100000000000000100000 # B if Carry branch

xx01110010011011 00001000000000000000100000 # B if Zero /not branch
xx11110010011011 00000100000000000000100000 # B if Zero branch

xx11110001011011 00001000000000000000100000 # B if n Zero /not branch
xx01110001011011 00000100000000000000100000 # B if n Zero branch

#Move16
xxxxxxx000x11000 00000000000000001000000010
xxxxxxx001x11000 00000010000000001000000010
xxxxxxx010x11000 00000100000000001000000010
xxxxxxx011x11000 00000000000000001000000010
xxxxxxx100x11000 00000000000000000000100000
xxxxxxx101x11000 00000010000000000000100000
xxxxxxx110x11000 00000100000000000000100000
xxxxxxx111x11000 00000000000000000000100000

#HALT
xxxxxxxxxxx10111 00000000000000000000000000

#Call
xxx1110011110100 10110110000000000010000100
xxx1110011110101 10111000000000000010001000
xxx1110011110110 00001000000000001000000010

#Goto
xxx1110011010001 10110110000000000010000100
xxx1110011010010 10111000000000000010001000
xxxxxxxxxxx10011 10110100000000000000100000

#Load 16B Imm
xxx1100000001110 10110110000000010010000000
xxx1100000001111 10111000000000100010000000
xxx1100000010000 00001000000000000000100000

#Store
xxx1001100001101 00000000000000000000010000
xxx1001100101101 00010000000000000000010000
xxx1001101001101 00100000000000000000010000
xxx1001101101101 00110000000000000000010000

#Load
xxx1001000001100 10110000001000000000000000
xxx1001000101100 10110000000100000000000000
xxx1001001001100 10110000000010000000000000
xxx1001001101100 10110000000001000000000000

#Inc XY
xxxxxxxxxxx01010 00000010000000000010000000
xxxxxxxxxxx01011 00001000000000001000000010


#Load Imm inst
xxxxxxxxxxx01000 11010000000000000000000000
xxxxx0xxxxx01001 11010000001000000000000000
xxxxx1xxxxx01001 11010000000100000000000000


#ALU
xxxxxxxx00000110 11000000000000000000000001
xxxxxxxx00100110 11000000010000000000000001
xxxxxxxx01000110 11000000100000000000000001
xxxxxxxx01100110 11000000110000000000000001
xxxxxxxx10000110 11000001000000000000000001
xxxxxxxx10100110 11000001010000000000000001
xxxxxxxx11000110 11000001100000000000000001
xxxxxxxx11100110 11000001110000000000000001

xxxxxxx000100111 11000000011000000000000001
xxxxxxx001000111 11000000101000000000000001
xxxxxxx001100111 11000000111000000000000001
xxxxxxx010000111 11000001001000000000000001
xxxxxxx010100111 11000001011000000000000001
xxxxxxx011000111 11000001101000000000000001
xxxxxxx011100111 11000001111000000000000001

xxxxxxx100100111 11000000010100000000000001

xxxxxxx101100111 11000000110100000000000001
xxxxxxx110000111 11000001000100000000000001

xxxxxxx111100111 11000001110100000000000001



#Move RegN <- RegA
xxxxxxxx00000100 00000000000000000000000000
xxxxx00000000101 00000000001000000000000000
xxxxx00100000101 00000000000100000000000000
xxxxx01000000101 00000000000010000000000000
xxxxx01100000101 00000000000001000000000000
xxxxx10000000101 00000000000000100000000000
xxxxx10100000101 00000000000000010000000000

xxxxx11100000101 00000000000000000100000000

#Move RegN <- RegB
xxxxxxxx00100100 00010000000000000000000000
xxxxx00000100101 00010000001000000000000000
xxxxx00100100101 00010000000100000000000000
xxxxx01000100101 00010000000010000000000000
xxxxx01100100101 00010000000001000000000000
xxxxx10000100101 00010000000000100000000000
xxxxx10100100101 00010000000000010000000000

xxxxx11100100101 00010000000000000100000000

#Move RegN <- RegC

xxxxx00101000101 00100000000100000000000000
xxxxx01001000101 00100000000010000000000000
xxxxx01101000101 00100000000001000000000000
xxxxx10001000101 00100000000000100000000000
xxxxx10101000101 00100000000000010000000000

xxxxx00001100101 00110000001000000000000000
xxxxx00101100101 00110000000100000000000000
xxxxx01001100101 00110000000010000000000000
xxxxx01101100101 00110000000001000000000000
xxxxx10001100101 00110000000000100000000000
xxxxx10101100101 00110000000000010000000000

xxxxx00010000101 01000000001000000000000000
xxxxx00110000101 01000000000100000000000000
xxxxx01010000101 01000000000010000000000000
xxxxx01110000101 01000000000001000000000000
xxxxx10010000101 01000000000000100000000000

xxxxx00010100101 01010000001000000000000000
xxxxx00110100101 01010000000100000000000000
xxxxx01010100101 01010000000010000000000000
xxxxx01110100101 01010000000001000000000000
xxxxx10010100101 01010000000000100000000000

#Move RegN <- RegX

xxxxx00011000101 01100000001000000000000000
xxxxx00111000101 01100000000100000000000000
xxxxx01011000101 01100000000010000000000000
xxxxx01111000101 01100000000001000000000000
xxxxx10011000101 01100000000000100000000000

xxxxx00011100101 01110000001000000000000000
xxxxx00111100101 01110000000100000000000000
xxxxx01011100101 01110000000010000000000000
xxxxx01111100101 01110000000001000000000000
